title: Bobby Shares Message About Male Bonding + Amy Has A Snooze Pact With Listener
itunes:title: Bobby Shares Message About Male Bonding + Amy Has A Snooze Pact With Listener
description:
Bobby addresses something men use as a form of bonding. Amy gives an update on the dog her family is fostering and also creates a snooze pact with a show listener.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
